title: Text - bio annihilation - author's use of evidence

content.prompt: Which of the following pieces of evidence presented in the article suggests that extinction rates may continue to increase?

choices.label: Populations are unable to rebound even when environmental stressors are removed.
Mammal populations are declining faster than other vertebrate groups.
Climate change will exacerbate the primary causes of population decline.
Species ranges are expanding as pollution increases in less-developed countries.

skill.text: Skill 3.C: Describe the author's reasoning (use of evidence to support a claim).
